subject: Re: [junit] test a GNU framework
msgSnippet: There is a lot of good information on the JUnit wiki hosted on GitHub. You can find that here: https://github.com/junit-team/junit/wiki More specific testing
messageBody:
There is a lot of good information on the JUnit wiki hosted on GitHub. You
can find that here:

https://github.com/junit-team/junit/wiki

More specific testing questions can also be asked in this mailing list as
well.

Corey

On Mar 23, 2013, at 7:31, mentat_thufir <mentat_thufir@...> wrote:



Is there a general approach to testing a library?

I'm trying to fork a GNU library, gnumail-providers.jar, and want to test
it as I go. Just read the manual on JUnit?

thanks,

Thufir
